question: (Sarah of the Clue Crew mixes a potent potable in a bar in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.)  Virtually Brazil's national drink, caipirinha is an icy concoction of fresh lime & cachaca, a liqueur distilled mainly from this sweet crop
